definition: hurricane/violent reform or revolution/violent movement or force

sentences.english: Deception Point is pulse-pounding fiction at its best.
sentences.chinese: 《大骗局》是让脉搏狂飙的登峰造极之作。

sentences.english: Another hue of blue for Marcelo Salas?
sentences.chinese: 萨拉斯能否在英伦再度掀起蓝色狂飙？

sentences.english: Will CYCLONUS ever learn to control his savage recklessness?
sentences.chinese: 狂飙可以学会控制他那不记后果的鲁莽吗？

sentences.english: Ride chief executive officer's adult and sorcery evil spirit of motor car hurricane to also know.
sentences.chinese: 骑着电动车狂飙的总裁大人和巫魅也知道。

sentences.english: Chaos theory is the storm and stress which is representative of remodeling science system.
sentences.chinese: 混沌理论是一项代表重新塑造科学体系的狂飙运动。

sentences.english: China’s patent surge has been evident for years.
sentences.chinese: 显而易见，近年来，中国的专利数一直在狂飙。

sentences.english: You know how big is this whole Bandslam thing around here?
sentences.chinese: 你可知道“乐团狂飙”在这儿是多么的重要？

definition: see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
out of control/berserk/to go for a long walk
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
a wild horse that refuses to be bridled (a metaphor for sth that runs wild)
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
